text: No Laughing Matter may refer to: *No Laughing Matter (book), an autobiographical work by Joseph Heller about his Guillain–Barré syndrome * "No Laughing Matter", an episode from season nine of the M*A*S*H TV series *"No Laughing Matter" (Garfield and Friends), an episode from the second season of Garfield and Friends Some people consider this to be no laughing matter, we disagree
title: No Laughing Matter
